-spec max_frequency_elements(Nums :: [integer()]) -> integer().
max_frequency_elements(Nums) ->
    % Count the frequency of each element
    Freqs = lists:foldl(fun(X, Acc) -> maps:update_with(X, fun(Y) -> Y + 1 end, 1, Acc) end, #{}, Nums),
    
    % Find the maximum frequency
    MaxFreq = maps:fold(fun(_Key, Value, Max) -> max(Value, Max) end, 0, Freqs),

    % Sum the frequencies of elements that have the maximum frequency
    SumMaxFreq = maps:fold(fun(_Key, Value, Sum) -> if Value == MaxFreq -> Sum + Value; true -> Sum end end, 0, Freqs),

    SumMaxFreq.
